languages.text: {n}Вожак раздосадованно харкает под ноги.{/n} "И вот нахрена я тут речи толкал? Думал, нормальн{mf|ый|ая} у нас Лорд-капитан, так нет — морда чистоплюйная! Ну держись теперь, Ваше Вашество".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вожак раздосадованно харкает под ноги.{/n} "И вот нахрена я тут речи толкал? Думал, нормальн{mf|ый|ая} у нас Лорд-капитан, так нет — морда чистоплюйная! Ну держись теперь, Ваше Вашество".

languages.text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."
languages.original_text: {n}Вожак раздосадованно харкает под ноги.{/n} "И вот нахрена я тут речи толкал? Думал, нормальн{mf|ый|ая} у нас Лорд-капитан, так нет — морда чистоплюйная! Ну держись теперь, Ваше Вашество".

traits.locale_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves a normal Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

{n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves a normal Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

{n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves a normal Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

{n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

{n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

languages.text: {n}El líder se separa del grupo, irritado.{/n} «¿Para qué demonios me molesto en plantarme aquí a soltar discursitos? ¡Yo creía que teníamos {mf|un|una} Lord Capitán que merecía la pena, pero qué va, es {mf|un estirado|una estirada}! Adelante pues, mi{mf|ord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El líder se separa del grupo, irritado.{/n} «¿Para qué demonios me molesto en plantarme aquí a soltar discursitos? ¡Yo creía que teníamos {mf|un|una} Lord Capitán que merecía la pena, pero qué va, es {mf|un estirado|una estirada}! Adelante pues, mi{mf|ord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}イラついたリーダーは地面に向かって痰を吐いた。{/n}「私は一体何のためにここに立って演説しているんだ？ロード・キャプテンなら大丈夫だと思ったが、いや、陛下は道徳的な方でしたね！さあ、始めましょう、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

traits.locale_text: {n}イラついたリーダーは地面に向かって痰を吐いた。{/n}「私は一体何のためにここに立って演説しているんだ？ロード・キャプテンなら大丈夫だと思ったが、いや、陛下は道徳的な方でしたね！さあ、始めましょう、陛下」

languages.text: {n}暴徒首领恼怒地啐了口口水。{/n}“我说了这么多，结果全他妈是白费口舌！我本以为新任领主舰长是个好家伙，可我错了，{mf|他|她}就是个老古板，死脑筋！既然如此，放马过来吧，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

traits.locale_text: {n}暴徒首领恼怒地啐了口口水。{/n}“我说了这么多，结果全他妈是白费口舌！我本以为新任领主舰长是个好家伙，可我错了，{mf|他|她}就是个老古板，死脑筋！既然如此，放马过来吧，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Anführer spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n} "Wozu in der Leere schwinge ich hier eigentlich große Reden? Ich dachte, wir haben einen brauchbaren Lord Captain, aber nein, {mf|er|sie} ist von der sittenstrengen Sorte! Dann lasst mal was sehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anführer spuckt angewidert auf den Boden.{/n} "Wozu in der Leere schwinge ich hier eigentlich große Reden? Ich dachte, wir haben einen brauchbaren Lord Captain, aber nein, {mf|er|sie} ist von der sittenstrengen Sorte! Dann lasst mal was sehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Le chef crache par terre sans chercher à cacher son agacement.{/n} « Le vide m'emporte, pourquoi je me suis fatigué à débiter tous ces beaux discours, hein ? Moi qui croyais qu'on avait hérité d'{mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} digne de ce nom, je me rends compte qu'on a affaire à {mf|un snobinard|une snobinarde} de la pire espèce ! Allez-y, Votre Seigneurité, je suis curieux de voir ce que vous avez dans le ventre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le chef crache par terre sans chercher à cacher son agacement.{/n} « Le vide m'emporte, pourquoi je me suis fatigué à débiter tous ces beaux discours, hein ? Moi qui croyais qu'on avait hérité d'{mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} digne de ce nom, je me rends compte qu'on a affaire à {mf|un snobinard|une snobinarde} de la pire espèce ! Allez-y, Votre Seigneurité, je suis curieux de voir ce que vous avez dans le ventre ! »

languages.text: {n}Lider, kızgınlıkla yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Uçsuz alsın beni, ne diye burada konuşup duruyorum ki ben? Başımıza düzgün bir Lord Kaptan geldiğini sanmıştım ama yok, dar görüşlünün teki çıktı. Elinizden geleni ardınıza koymayın o hâlde {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The leader spits on the ground in annoyance.{/n} "What in the void have I been standing here making speeches for? I thought we had ourselves an all right Lord Captain, but no, {mf|he|she}'s the strait-laced type! Bring it on, then, Your {mf|Lordliness|Ladyness}."
